name: Rag Doll Kung Fu: Fists of Plastic
name_original: Rag Doll Kung Fu: Fists of Plastic
description:
Rag Doll Kung Fu: Fists of Plastic is an arcade-fighting game developed by Tarsier Studios. It came out on 09-04-2009. It was published by Sony Computer Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Rag Doll Kung Fu: Fists of Plastic on PlayStation 3.
